short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hub3c Screen Sharing Extension for Chrome to enable screen sharing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hub3c Screen Sharing allows you to share your screen within Hub3c platform (https://live.hub3c.com/). You will have an option to share your screen or selected window during Hub Video Call. The screen or window you select will be shared to other participants.
